name: Quilombo in the Space
description:
Hello Everyone!


I'm releasing this little game that I made back in 2017!

This is my first project in GameMaker Studio 1.4. Here I learned many things to develop other games.

I have made some updates to release it here.

This game uses a mix between Drag and Drop and Code and should rebuild the entire game to make it work a bit better.

If you want me to update this game on GameMaker 2 please leave a comment!

Keyboard Controls

Movement: W A S D

Shoot: J (Hold to run)

Jump: K

Gamepad Controls

Movement: Analog or D-Pad

Shoot: X (Hold to run)

Jump: K

I hope you enjoy it!
